well if they spelled it wrong, you did too. you both spelled it the same... and its correct
They actually spelled it wrong.  It was edited shortly after... You should think about possibilities before you comment on something.
Where is my "Special" Icon for gifting someone?

They said that the icon was going to be given out a couple weeks after the Lunar Revel, because they have to do it manually or something of that matter :)
If I'm not right, then I hope I was close enough xD
They said it would take up to two weeks to get the icon. That means anywhere form when you first gave a gift to two weeks from when you gave the gift
Got my icon right away
They said it would take two weeks for the Nemesis Draft icon. The Goat icon is immediate.
No skins for Persian New Year? (Which is much older) Racists!
Chinese New Year started about 1800 years before Persian New Year.

I wish they would still give special border trims for people who buy skins when they are first released and then put jnto the vault. They have only done that for the original legacy skins being brought back. I wanna be special :'(
I'm still hoping for Pax {{champion:15}} , I won't hold my breath but one can hope!
haha good one. that isnt happening any time soon.

Do you own any limited (Championship Riven, Riot Singed, Victorious anything, PAX, etc.) skins? Because if Riot decides to change the status of any of those skins to legacy at any point in the future... Then there may still be hope for you to receive the icon/modified splash you're hoping for.
